name: TotalKneeReplacement
title: Total Knee Replacement
description:
This value set identifies total knee replacement with any substitute (autologous, synthetic, nonautologous)

NOTE:  VALUE SET UNDER DEVELOPMENT AS MEASURE TESTING IS ONGOING.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have  total knee replacement procedures.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a total knee replacement procedure.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent the surgical procedure of a total knee replacement with any substitute (autologous, synthetic, nonautologous)),(Exclusion Criteria: Partial knee replacements, revisions, resurfacing procedures.)
